casebody.data:
STATE of Missouri, Respondent,
v.
Santon CLAY, Appellant. No. ED 105630 Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, DIVISION ONE. Filed: August 7, 2018 FOR APPELLANT: Jessica Hathaway, 120 South Central Ave., Ste. 130, St. Louis, MO 63105. FOR RESPONDENT: Joshua D. Hawley, Attorney General, Julia E. Neidhardt, Asst. Atty. Gen., P.O. Box 899, Jefferson City, MO 65102. Before Roy L. Richter, P.J., Robert M. Clayton III, J., and Angela T. Quigless, J.

ORDER

PER CURIAM.

Santon Clay appeals the judgment entered on a jury verdict convicting him of three counts of unlawful possession of a firearm. We find no error has occurred.

No jurisprudential purpose would be served by a written opinion. We have, however, provided the parties a memorandum setting forth the reasons for our decision. The judgment of the trial court is affirmed under Rule 30.25(b).
